original: Leffler, Justus Edvin, direktör, Kin-na, f. 23/8/75 i Gbg av gr0’sshandl. o. godsäg. Charles Albert L. o. Hilda Lithman. G. 09 m. Disa Erikson. Barn: Ulf Edvin f. 09, Gudrun 10, Hilda Marianne 16. — Stud. v. Karlstads h. a. 1. t. 90, prakt, i ind:f:irma i Gbg 91-06, språkstud. i Engl. o. Tyskl. 07. Verkst. dir. i Kinnaströms Väveri A-B 12-46. Led. av riksd. andra kamm. 21-24 o. 27-36, led. av riksd. första kamm. 37 o. av andra kamm. 38-40, led. av ett flertal riksd :utsk., v. ordf. i bankoutsk. 33-36, led. av riksdag. 500-årsjub :komm. o. 36 års riks-d :huskomm., landstingsman 18-42, ordf. i landstingets fin :utsk. sed. 35, led. av Kinna s :ns komm:nd sed. 13, komm;-fullm. 19-39, ordf. 25-34, ordf. i kom-m:stämma sed. 15, munic :stämma sed. 25, munic :nd o. munic :fullm. 25-39, led. av skolråd 25-31, kyrkovärd sed. 13, v. ordf. i Västergötl. o. N. Hall. hand :kamm. 31, ordf. 45, ordf. i dess arbetsutskott 31 v. ordf. i Kinna-Örby egnahemsfören. sed. 13, ordf. i Sv. textil- o. konfektionsfabr :fören. 33-46, suppl. i Älvsb. 1. hush:sällsk. förvaltn :utsk. 34-40. RNO, RVO, ProPatrstGM, Älvsb. 1. brandkårsförb. hed :t. i guld.
translated: Leffler, Justus Edvin, director, Kinna, b. 23/8/75 in Gothenburg, son of wholesale merchant and landowner Charles Albert L. and Hilda Lithman. Married in 1909 to Disa Erikson. Children: Ulf Edvin b. 1909, Gudrun b. 1910, Hilda Marianne b. 1916. Studied at the Karlstad High School until 1890, practical training in an industry firm in Gothenburg from 1891 to 1906, studied languages in English and German in 1907. Executive director at Kinnaströms Väveri A-B from 1912 to 1946. Member of the Second Chamber of the Swedish Parliament from 1921 to 1924 and from 1927 to 1936, member of the First Chamber in 1937 and of the Second Chamber from 1938 to 1940, member of several parliamentary committees, vice-chairman of the banking committee from 1933 to 1936, member of the 500-year anniversary committee of the Swedish Parliament and the 1936 Parliamentary Building Committee, county council member from 1918 to 1942, chairman of the county council's finance committee since 1935, member of Kinna municipality council since 1913, municipal commissioner from 1919 to 1939, chairman from 1925 to 1934, chairman of municipal meeting and municipal board from 1925 to 1939, member of the school board from 1925 to 1931, churchwarden since 1913, vice-chairman of the West Gothland and North Halland Chamber of Commerce in 1931, chairman in 1945, chairman of its working committee in 1931, vice-chairman of the Kinna-Örby Homeownership Association since 1913, chairman of the Swedish Textile and Clothing Manufacturers' Association from 1933 to 1946, substitute member of the Älvsborg County Housekeeping Society's management committee from 1934 to 1940. Knight of the Royal Order of the North Star, Knight of the Royal Order of Vasa, Pro Patria Gold Medal, honorary member in gold of the Älvsborg County Fire Brigade Association.
